contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Newspaper | name = The Hokkaido Shimbun | type = Daily [[newspaper]] | format = Blanket (54.6 cm x 40.65 cm) | foundation = January 20, 1887 | price = Morning edition: 130 [[Japanese yen|Yen]]/copy<br /> Evening edition: 50 Yen/copy<br /> Subscription: 3,925 Yen/month (Morning and evening edition)| owners = The Hokkaido Shimbun Press | publisher = Ikuo Kikuchi | language = [[Japanese language|Japanese]] | circulation = Morning edition: 1,223,184 <br /> Evening edition: 673,410<br /> (Japan [[Audit Bureau of Circulations (Japan)|ABC]], average for January–June 2005)| headquarters = [[Sapporo, Hokkaido|Sapporo]] | website = [http://www.hokkaido-np.co.jp/ www.hokkaido-np.co.jp]| }} [[Image:Doshin Building Sapporo 20070603-001.jpg|thumb|Headquarters of the Hokkaido Shimbun Press in Sapporo.]] The {{nihongo|'''''Hokkaido Shimbun'''''|北海道新聞|Hokkaidō Shinbun}}, which is often abbreviated as {{nihongo|'''''Doshin'''''|道新|Dōshin}}, is a [[Japanese language]] daily [[newspaper]] published mainly in [[Hokkaidō]], [[Japan]] by {{nihongo|'''The Hokkaido Shimbun Press'''|株式会社北海道新聞社|Kabushiki-gaisha Hokkaidō Shinbunsha}}. As of November 2006, its morning edition has a circulation of 1,208,175.<ref>According to the circulation report to Japan Audit Bureau of Circulations, on {{ja icon}} [http://www5.hokkaido-np.co.jp/information/kai/ Hokkaido Shimbun's corporate profile].</ref> It was first published in [[Sapporo]] in 1887. == References == {{reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.hokkaido-np.co.jp/ Hokkaido Shimbun] (Japanese) {{Japanese Newspapers}} [[Category:Newspapers published in Japan]] [[Category:1887 establishments in Japan]] [[Category:Publications established in 1887]] [[Category:Newspaper companies of Japan]] [[Category:Companies based in Hokkaido]] [[Category:Media in Sapporo]] {{Asia-newspaper-stub}} {{Japan-company-stub}}
